reviews.review: Este game é muito divertido. E recomendo a compra. É divertido jogar sozinho ou reunir os amigos. Mas não são só alegrias, os monstros pagos são desbalanceados, muito fortes. Existem bugs que estragam a gameplay e não são corrigidos com a agilidade. Não há como conversar dentro do game entre os sobreviventes (pelo menos até a última vez que joguei)

Para los que no conozcan 'Dead by Daylight' se trata de un título multijugador de 4vs1. El jugador que va en solitario toma el papel de un despiadado asesino que junto a sus armas, trampas y habilidades, deberá dar caza al resto de personas encarnarán a un grupo de humanos, Dead by Daylight se a convertido en mi Top 1 de juegos favoritos, es muy adictivo y por el precio que tiene vale totalmente la pena comprarlo y viciarlo por muuuucho tiempo, De verdad, si no tenes este juego en tu biblioteca, no se que estas haciendo con tu vida COMPRALO AHORA QUE ES UN JUEGO EXCELENTISIMO, 1000000000/10 100% recomendado.

Dbd is still a really enjoyable game that i recommend for any1

A very deadly game of cat and mouse. As a survivor, do your best to avoid the killer and escape the trial. Play a lone wolf or cooperate with other survivors- the choice is yours. Killers each have a unique power to hunt down and sacrifice the survivors. Both roles are fun in their own ways. The various perks, items, add-ons and procedurally generated maps make each trial unique and exciting, and makes the game very replayable in the long run. At high ranks, games get very sweaty and competitive. Yes, players can be toxic and the game has its fair share of bugs but the exhilarating moments like reaching the exit gate with the killer one second behind you or getting those satisfying four man kills makes up for it. New content is added to the game fairly often as well.

la verdad, sexo (odio a los doctores)

This game was a lot of fun for a while but the company and developers got greedy and are now known for changing killer dynamics and attributes to help them sell packs and bundles. If someone in the game wants to do better all they have to do is pay for it now and the whole play style has shifted. It's very one sided and now it's like you play to get frustrated and the fun is really dried up. The game used to be a balance of the killer trying to manage generators and chasing and finding survivors but there are so many perks that allow killers to instantly see you and track you. Killers don't bother to kick generators because of the new release and so now we just run from killers until inevitably you are found and run down to nothing because of speed bonuses or simple add ons that make killer chases several seconds with no real essence or thought. They also have poor networking on their servers and the character models are reused and poorly done at best with objects not having collisions and rubber banding leaving survivors sol if they rely on a moment to use their perk or a pallet. Some killers are known to have lunges and hit you when they shouldn't be able to and you would think that if they would put any time into it they would fix it with interactive multiplayer games like apex and war zone being able to support hundreds of people but they cant figure out how to do five. The designers and engineers moved on from this project and left the imbeciles to maintain it and just make skins. It's like they use intern level staff to make these assets and game mechanics. How out of touch and lazy can one be in their game. F

Hey you, YES YOU. If you want depression, anger issues, brain damage, or just plain and simple a dysfunctional brain, play this game. The campers and tunnelers are good at that as well as the toxic survivors. No matter which side you play on there's a little depression out there for everyone. I still cry myself to sleep everyday. Have a wonderful day :)
Like Team games? This game will make you hate working with others, but you have to in order to survive.

ТОЛЬКО НАЧАЛ ИГРАТЬ:
Эх старая добрая дбд,начал в неё еще играть в 2017г и играю до сих пор
Игра очень крутая,особенно когда за тобой бежит ман и до палетки тебе пару шагов но тебя вот вот ударят,твое очко сжимается на столько сильно,что словами это не передать,лучше самому попробовать поиграть 
Теперь перейдем к + и - игры
Начнем с +
1.В игре довольно приятная графика
2.В связи с частыми обновлениями игра не надоедает её еще не забросили)
3.С друзьями из это игры ты врят-ли вылезешь хоть весь день играй
4.Это по сути должно относится к - но я не могу,баги тут есть,но они на столько угарные,что когда по карте бегал перевернутый маньяк и тебя 1 ударом отправляли в космос я чуть не задохнулся со смеху так что пусть частичка минуса будет плюсом)
Теперь перейдем к -
1.Игра достаточно требовательная и на слабеньких пк(ноутбуках) особо не поиграешь
2.Те же самые баги только уже с отрицательной стороны,бывает застрянешь в текстурах тебя сольют,но или ты(если играешь за мана)
3.Токсичное поведение выживших,эта отдельная тема разговора 
4.Много доната,простым смертным как я не приобрести некоторых персонажей,я понимаю 133р не дорого,но не каждый сможет позволить потратить эти деньги на персонажа или скин
5.Валюту,а именно радужные осколки накопить очень сложно и долго
На этом все,спасибо за внимание и прошу прощения за орфографический инсульт)
